alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nye County through 400 PM PDT... At 328 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 33 miles south of Blue Eagle Ranch, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Nye County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
